thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com | 4 of 86
thread.title: Millie

author: Millie
title: Millie
text:
I had a horrible time making up my mind, that's the only negative part of this review!
I finally decided on 047 Miss, in Rouge Dior. It is perfect! I have worn it every day since it arrived and no other lipstick interests me now. If feels right, it looks amazing, I love it.
I also got a lining pencil, Fixit, and Lip Glow (Pink). All perfect. I expect that the samples (I had dithered among four colors, they sent me samples of those four!) are perfect, too, but I've been busy trying to decide which foundation I should get... I think I'll go with Diorskin Star.
I will never buy any other brand of lipstick. After my next purchase, I hope to say the same about foundation!
